Title: The History of the Siege of Lisbon.

Authors: Jose Saramago;Giovanni Pontiero.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=2SQ7j8g8ZskC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: When Raimundo Silva, humble proof-reader for a Lisbon publishing house, takes it upon himself to insert a negative into the sentence of a history book, he rewrites history. The effect of this act of insubordination is to make his editor, the voluptuous Dr Maria Sara, fall in love with him..
